    • getPersonValue

      public static java.lang.Object getPersonValue​(java.lang.String param, Person person, long time)
      Retrieve the desired value from a Person model. Check for a VitalSign first and then an attribute if there is no VitalSign by the provided name. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if neither exists.
      Parameters:
      param - name of the VitalSign or attribute to retrieve from the Person
      person - Person instance to get the parameter from
      time - current time
      Returns:
      value

      Parameters:
      param - name of the VitalSign or attribute to retrieve from the Person
      person - Person instance to get the parameter from
      time - current time
      Returns:
      value

      public java.math.BigDecimal evaluateFromSimResults​(org.simulator.math.odes.MultiTable results, double leadTime)
      Evaluates the provided expression given the simulation results.
      Parameters:
      results - table of simulation results
      leadTime - lead time in seconds before using table values
      Returns:
      BigDecimal result value
